description.narrative: “This Program is targeting RE market barriers nd aim to initiate the track record of RE systems and contribute to accelerating private sector participation in off-grid RE development, with a significant focus on solar PV. The Program will aim to support two sub-projects: a. Advisory support to the PPP scheme on the island of La Gonave to develop a standalone mini grid RE network; and b. An investment that will seek to create a virtual grid using renewable energy”

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
